thread.title: L.A. billboards target misconduct scandal ahead of Oscars

title: L.A. billboards target misconduct scandal ahead of Oscars
text:
L.A. billboards target misconduct scandal ahead of Oscars 2:38am GMT - 01:11 
Just days before the Academy Awards ceremony, three billboards in Hollywood were covered Wednesday with slogans blasting the entertainment industry over the recent sexual misconduct accusations. Colette Luke has more.   
Just days before the Academy Awards ceremony, three billboards in Hollywood were covered Wednesday with slogans blasting the entertainment industry over the recent sexual misconduct accusations. Colette Luke has more.  //reut.rs/2oFaJSY
